title: Relax in a Spa & by a Fire Pit Amongst the Rolling Hills of Rural Gloucester
description: Want to truly get away from it all? Head to Dam It Getaway, a serene countryside escape near the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Barrington Tops National Park in rural New South Wales, just a 1.5-hour drive from Newcastle Airport. Stay in a cosy self-contained cabin surrounded by 78 acres of rolling green farmland with a complimentary bottle of wine or sparkling on arrival and late checkout at 12pm guaranteed.
offer_address: 81 Kia Ora Hill Road, Gloucester, New South Wales 2422, Australia Gloucester, NSW 2422
